contribute.title: Contribute
contribute.description: DVC is 100% open source. We welcome contributions to our code and docs.

events.title: Events
events.description: Learn more about DVC and meet our team virtually or in person! We're appearing at conferences, meetups, and talks around the world.
events.mobileDescription: Come to hear more about DVC

learn.title: Learn
learn.description: There are many ways to learn about DVC: check out our documentation, our blogs and monthly Heartbeats, recommended reads, and more.

meet.description: Ask questions, find answers, and connect with the DVC community.
